title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama daemon.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, retrieval and more.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support and streaming callbacks.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper (Node) that adds chat repl, prompt templates and output formatting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app that talks to Ollama over REST; macOS/Windows/Linux builds.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model you choose.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async HTTP and SSE streaming support.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library that provides a simple GenServer wrapper around Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, completion, and embedding APIs; includes sample Blazor UI.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration that forwards @mentions to a local Ollama model and replies in thread.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.
